sentences.en: A catalyst is a substance which speeds up a chemical reaction.
sentences.cn: 催化剂是一种能加速化学反应的物质.

sentences.en: Activated charcoal is known to be an excellent catalyst for many reactions.
sentences.cn: 已知活性炭对很多反应是一种极好的催化剂.

sentences.en: Commercially two main types of hydrogenations are carried out with Nickel catalyst.
sentences.cn: 商业上采用的以镍作催化剂的氢化有两种.

sentences.en: Each electrode is impregnated with a catalyst to speed the oxidation reduction or half reaction.
sentences.cn: 每个电极掺入催化剂,以加重电池半氧化或还原反应.

sentences.en: For the catalyst producer, catalyst manufacturing cost and material limitations are paramount.
sentences.cn: 对于催化剂制造厂来说, 催化剂生产成本和原料规格限定是最重要的.

sentences.en: He said he saw the bank's role as a catalyst to encourage foreign direct investment.
sentences.cn: 他说，他认为银行就应该起到刺激外国直接投资的作用。

sentences.en: I see my role as being a catalyst for change.
sentences.cn: 我认为我的角色是促成变革。

sentences.en: I very much hope that this case will prove to be a catalyst for change.
sentences.cn: 我非常希望这件事终将成为促成变化的催化剂。

sentences.en: It acts as a catalyst in the process of fermentation.
sentences.cn: 它在发酵过程中起触媒的作用.

sentences.en: The catalyst is subjected to a uniform ram pressure.
sentences.cn: 催化剂承受均匀活塞压力.

sentences.en: The offer of a new job provided just the catalyst she needed.
sentences.cn: 这份新工作正是她所需要转变的契机.

sentences.en: The reaction takes place only in the presence of a catalyst.
sentences.cn: 只有在催化剂的作用下,反应才会发生.

sentences.en: There is actually a failure of the integral particle of the catalyst.
sentences.cn: 实际上存在有整粒催化剂的破碎.

sentences.en: They hope his election will act as a catalyst for reform.
sentences.cn: 他们希望他的当选会成为改革的催化剂。

sentences.en: This process relies on a catalyst of high selectivity and week activity.
sentences.cn: 这过程所靠的是一种高选择性和低活性的催化剂.

sentences.en: To pass the water test the catalyst should not disintegrate or crumble.
sentences.cn: 经过泡水试验,催化剂应不开裂或破碎.

sentences.en: Various ceramic materials have been suggested as supports for reforming catalyst.
sentences.cn: 各种陶土管用作转化催化剂的载体.

words.tran_cn: 接触反应的；起催化作用的

phrases.tran_cn: 非均相催化剂；多相催化；不匀触媒
废催化剂；用过的催化剂

trans.tran_cn: <化>触媒，催化剂，〈比喻〉触发因素，促进因素，〈口〉有感染力的人
trans.tran_en: a substance that makes a chemical reaction happen more quickly without being changed itself
